title: Did 233 representatives vote for the 2.9 billion trillion dollar "stealing" social security?
subtitle: The allegations that legislators voted to spend a surplus of social security to repay government debt stem from an alarming calculation of a balanced and failed budget adjustment.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: United States of America In April 2018, representatives voted to use funds from the social security surplus of $2.9 trillion in an effort to balance the budget.
